section.title: codeType
section.para: codeType - indicates the type of an object.

listitem.para: The value must be set to one of the following values:

simplelist.member: "quote" - Inline quotation (as opposed to a block citation)
"other" - Type of element not covered by any of the other top-level types.

listitem.para: One can further specify the type of a code using the subType property.
